title: Get A Life
author: Callum Gare
description: Just letting you know, this is a demo of Choice Assist. Which is intended for making interactive versions of these, a kind of cross between a choose your own adventure novel and a deckbuilding game. So you probably wont find this particular example to be terribly exciting.

contains.title: City
contains.description: The place where things happen, career opportunities, Nightlife, the weird and the wonderful. It an also be a place of great isolation. Sometimes you might find yourself alone in a crowd of people.

contains.title: Suburbs
contains.description:
The burbs; Backyards, plenty of room to bike around, bit calmer than the city but less disconnected than anywhere more rural. Where the suburb anthem of lawn mowers and whipper snippers plays every Saturday morning.

You can pick up to 3 of this one.

contains.title: Countryside
contains.description:
Space for days. Life here tends to be pretty quite and straight forward. You might be out of luck though if you're not interested in farming or running a general store.

You can pick unlimited amounts of this one.

contains.title: Island
contains.description: If you appreciate getting away from it all then this might be your dream local. Just don't expect too many modern conveniences

contains.title: Job
contains.description: Your main and presumably paid occupation.

contains.title: Mechanic
contains.description: The wear of an engine after you've giving it a good going over brings you a supreme joy. Average pay.

contains.title: Engineer
contains.description: You've loved making things ever since you were knee-high to a grasshopper. You still get to do some of that among the more boring parts of your job. But you get paid pretty good money so that always helps.

contains.title: Entertainer
contains.description: Maybe you make movies or produce music. But whatever it is you've fought hard to make your passion a viable career. The pay's not great but it's enough and you spend your days doing what you love.

contains.title: Hobby
contains.description: What do you do in your down time?

contains.title: Photography
contains.description: You enjoy nothing more than the satisfaction of capturing a slice of the world in an image.

contains.title: Painting
contains.description: When you paint you enter a semi-meditative state, the whole world seems lighter.

contains.title: Dance
contains.description: You've never been able to keep still and dance allows you to channel that energy.
